summary.title: eTorch Threat Model
summary.description: The eTorch system is an intelligent IoT lighting solution consisting of WiFi-enabled eTorch devices, optional field gateways, mobile and Windows control applications, an embedded web management interface, and a cloud portal hosted by eHomeSystems. Users and administrators can control lighting, schedules, firmware updates, and device groups locally and remotely using HTTP/HTTPS. The system also supports optional voice control via third-party voice assistants and operates with limited functionality when offline using locally cached schedules.
